1:
--------------------
Text: Ruthin Gaol:  Ruthin Gaol ceased to be a prison in 1916 when the prisoners and guards were transferred to Shrewsbury.
Triplets:<Ruthin Gaol
2:
--------------------
Text: Ruthin Gaol:  The County Council bought the buildings in 1926 and used part of them for offices, the county archives, and the town library.
Triplets:<Ruthin Gaol
4:
--------------------
Text: Ruthin Gaol:  In 2004 the Gaol was extensively renovated and reopened as a museum.

Triplets:<Ruthin Gaol
